All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ButtonFactory
Factory class to create standardized buttons for the GUI.
EdgeCompatibilityChecker
Compares two EdgeResult instances and determines if they are compatible.
EdgeResult
Represents the result of an edge extraction process on a puzzle piece.
Home
JavaFX main GUI container.
LabelFactory
Utility factory class to create pre-styled JavaFX Labels.
Main
Main launcher for the CY-Puzzle application.
PieceSave
Record representing a saved puzzle piece's ID, orientation, and coordinates in the grid.
ProgressListener
Interface used to monitor the progress of puzzle generation or solving.
PuzzleAnalyzer
Analyzes a single puzzle piece to extract its edges and determine its position.
PuzzleAnalyzer.Side
Enum representing the four possible sides of a puzzle piece.
PuzzleImageViewer
JavaFX component for displaying and manipulating the assembled puzzle image.
PuzzleSolver
PuzzleSolver résout un puzzle jigsaw sans rotation des pièces.
PuzzleSolver.ProgressListener
Interface to track puzzle solving progress.
PuzzleSolver.PuzzleResult
Résultat de la résolution : matrice d'IDs et liste des pièces non placées.
SideBarFactory
Factory class to generate the sidebar of the puzzle GUI.
StatsPanelFactory
Factory class to generate the statistics panel in the GUI.
